Text: new year new jobPST Happy new year For those of you have not heard yet I am leaving Deloitte Touche on January My articling time is officially in that day and I am heading back to Red Deer to buy my dads water business Im very excited about the opportunity You can reach me at my Deloitte email address until the th I have set up a hotmail account that I will use once I leave I start work in Red Deer on January Below is my new contact info email cell Calgary work Hope to talk to you all soon Mike Mike George Bcomm Senior Accountant Deloitte Touche LLP Assurance and Advisory Services Tel Fax
